statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-5 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 2 , -2 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - x - 6 , 2 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 2 , -4 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 3 , -6 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
